bill_title: Congratulating Lindsey Smith for taking a "shot" and for being named the Class A Ms. Volleyball for 2014 and for receiving an Under Armour All-American Volleyball Team Honorable Mention for the 2014-2015 year.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Congratulating Lindsey Smith for taking a "shot" and for being named the Class A Ms. Volleyball for 2014 and for receiving an Under Armour All-American Volleyball Team Honorable Mention for the 2014-2015 year. WHEREAS, Lindsey Smith "set" her Dakota Dunes volleyball team up to play for two consecutive championships through her teamwork, dedication, and "dumps"; and WHEREAS, Coach Rich Pruit's guidance and the hours of practice "peppers" helped Lindsey and her team "serve" their opponents "tough bacon"; and WHEREAS, Lindsey's parents, Kam and Melissa, have continuously "assisted" Lindsey in pursuing her volleyball career and supported Lindsey in perfecting her "back-twos," "loops," and "stacks": NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninetieth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Lindsey Smith be congratulated on her accomplishments and that the Legislature wishes her well as she "attacks" her next "match" where she will represent South Dakota as a UN-K Loper volleyball team member.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Congratulating Lindsey Smith for taking a "shot" and for being named the Class A Ms. Volleyball for 2014 and for receiving an Under Armour All-American Volleyball Team Honorable Mention for the 2014-2015 year. WHEREAS, Lindsey Smith "set" her Dakota Dunes volleyball team up to play for two consecutive championships through her teamwork, dedication, and "dumps"; and WHEREAS, Coach Rich Pruit's guidance and the hours of practice "peppers" helped Lindsey and her team "serve" their opponents "tough bacon"; and WHEREAS, Lindsey's parents, Kam and Melissa, have continuously "assisted" Lindsey in pursuing her volleyball career and supported Lindsey in perfecting her "back-twos," "loops," and "stacks": NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninetieth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Lindsey Smith be congratulated on her accomplishments and that the Legislature wishes her well as she "attacks" her next "match" where she will represent South Dakota as a UN-K Loper volleyball team member. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
